results.title: England fans threatened with Euro 2016 bloodbath in France's 'Kalashnikov capital
results.subtext: ENGLAND fans were warned they would be the target of knife-wielding drug taking thugs in Europe’s capital of crime – Marseille – long before last night's brawl.

results.title: Euro 2016: Dozens injured as crowds of rival fans brawl
results.subtext: Packs of Russian and English football fans clashed in the French city of Marseille in a third straight day of battles at the Euro 2016 championship.

results.title: UK hooligans, locals clash in French city ahead of soccer event
results.subtext: Riot police in France have used tear gas to halt clashes between British soccer fans and locals in the French port city of Marseilles ahead of a European soccer event.
